#include <stdio.h>
int main(){
       int T,a,b;
       int temp1,temp2,temp3,temp4;
       
       scanf("%d",&T);
       
       while(T--)
       {
         temp1 = temp2 = temp3 = temp4 = 0;
         scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
         while(a!=0)
         {
           temp1 *= 10;
           temp1 += (a%10);
           a/=10;
           }
           
         while(b!=0)
         {
           temp2 *= 10;
           temp2 += (b%10);
           b/=10;
           }
           
           temp3 = temp1+temp2;
           
         while(temp3!=0)
         {
           temp4 *= 10;
           temp4 += (temp3%10);
           temp3/=10;
           }
           
           printf("%d\n",temp4);
           }
           
           return 0;
          }
